label: Good
details: Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk

label: Moderate
details: Air quality is acceptable; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.

label: Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups
details: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected.

label: Unhealthy
details: Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects

label: Very Unhealthy
details: Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is more likely to be affected.

label: Hazardous
details: Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects
